DOC.brief_summary: Periconceptional supplementation folic acid - synthetic form B-vitamin folate - reduces occurrence adverse pregnancy outcome spina bifida . The underlying biochemical mechanism folic acid affect health outcome however unknown . The naturally occur form 5-methyltetrahydrofolate ( 5-MTHF ) available discussed adequate substitute folic acid . This study aim determine effect folic acid compare 5-MTHF cellular mechanism . Stable isotope tracer protocol use allow determine effect folic acid dynamic metabolic pathway human body . Hypothesis : Supplementation high-dose folic acid alters turnover rate folate dependent pathway healthy human ; 5-MTHF . Genetic variation key enzyme folate metabolism aggravate effect folic acid metabolic pathway .
DOC.brief_title: Impact High-dose Folic Acid Supplementation Pathways Linked DNA Formation
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy Body mass index 1924 kg/m2 Normal folate , vitamin B12 , B6 status Unable swallow tablet Unable receive intravenous catheter Use vitamin supplement , amino acid protein supplement six month study participation Chronic consumption highprotein diet ( e.g . Atkins Diet ) Medical condition diabetes , asthma , cancer , cardiovascular disease , history neural tube defect ( spina bifida ) affect pregnancy , gastrointestinal surgery , abnormal kidney , thyroid function , psychiatric illness , chronic disease Pregnancy lactation Smoking , use recreational drug , and/or consumption one alcohol drink per day seven per week . Use longterm prescription medication hormonal contraceptive , antidepressant , anticonvulsant , anticoagulant , chronic medication Blood donation last three month prior study start Unable provide inform consent , unable read write English Low compliance intervention determine early steadystate reduction blood folate concentration
